content.rendered:
same day delivery service

Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home.

Get Started
Get a special quote for business

    same day delivery service

    Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home.

    Get Started

    Trusted By 270+ Global Brands

    Door-To-Door Delivery, with Benefits

    Forget expensive couriers and long shipping lines. Whether you’re sending something local or nationwide, Roadie is an easy, inexpensive way for businesses and individuals to get stuff delivered.

    REQUEST A QUOTE

    Door-To-Door Delivery, with Benefits

    Forget expensive couriers and long shipping lines. Whether you’re sending something local or nationwide, Roadie is an easy, inexpensive way for businesses and individuals to get stuff delivered.

    REQUEST A QUOTE
    Get a special quote for business

      Flexible, scalable same-day delivery. Nationwide.

      We mean it when we say Shypr business delivery services in your local area are second to none.

      So, without making any delay, connect with our professional and experienced team to get your parcel delivered. We assure you to provide same-day delivery of your package irrespective of your location!

      REQUEST A QUOTE

      Vendor Services

      We mean it when we say Shypr business delivery services in your local area are second to none. So, without making any delay, connect with our professional and experienced team to get your parcel delivered. We assure you to provide same-day delivery of your package irrespective of your location!

      Retail

      A group of seasoned logistics professionals delivers dependable and budget-friendly retail delivery solutions catering to businesses of every scale. Our objective is to simplify the process for retailers, ensuring the smooth transition of their products into the hands of their customers.

      Learn More

      Health Care

      Experience complete peace of mind for each pharmacy delivery, as we've integrated features to safeguard your privacy. These measures include driver vetting and contactless delivery, ensuring your order is brought right to your doorstep securely.

      Learn More

      Industrial

      Employing your own vehicles for deliveries? Capitalize on Shypr when timeframes become stringent or when demand surpasses your capability. Utilize our on-demand network of drivers from the crowd to expand your equipment transport capacity without the need for new vehicle purchases or additional staff recruitment.

      Learn More

      Business services

      With our business parcel delivery services, the industries we specialize in providing deliveries include the following:

      Hardware & Electronics

      Read More

      Extra large products & Moving

      Read More

      Food & Catering

      Read More

      Documents & Legal services

      Read More

      Flowers & Plants

      Read More

      Cosmetics & Beauty Products

      Read More

      Auto Parts & Tools

      Read More

      • Provide Same Day Delivery
      • Enhance Your Business
      • Retain Loyal Customers
      • Monitor Real-Time Deliveries

      We mean it when we say Shypr business delivery services in your local area are second to none.

      So, without making any delay, connect with our professional and experienced team to get your parcel delivered. We assure you to provide same-day delivery of your package irrespective of your location!

      Advantages of Shypr

      Competitive Pricing Tool

      Our delivery prices are nearly 60% lower than our competition! The more items you send to one location, the lower the price.

      Delivery When you Want it

      Whether it’s on-demand or scheduled, we deliver your items exactly when you want them. We got you covered.

      Delivery Efficiency

      Using our AI-powered route optimization platform, we’ve managed to reduce the median delivery time to nearly 55 minutes!

      Professional

      All of our drivers have prior experience in the delivery business handling items both big and small with the utmost care.

      Live ETA Updates

      Clients don’t need to guess when their package will arrive as we provide real-time updates within a 15 minute time window.

      Delivery Dashboard

      From billing to real-time GPS tracking of live orders, we make sure to keep all your deliveries in for your convenience.

      Why Shypr For Small Business?

      Collaborating with businesses of varying sizes throughout the nation, Shypr facilitates a seamless and economical answer for swift and same-day deliveries, allowing you to concentrate on managing your enterprise. Whether you require a dependable main delivery associate or a periodic supplement to your current fleet, Shypr offers a convenient and adaptable option that benefits both your clientele and your financial performance.

      Broaden Your Horizon

      Extend your delivery radius to cover up to 40 miles and prolong order cut-off times during evenings and weekends.

      Personalized Experience

      Include specific instructions for a customized, direct-to-door delivery service. Avoid any unnecessary transfers or additional handling of your items by multiple parties.

      Maximize Time and Cost Savings

      Streamline your efficiency by uploading and arranging multiple deliveries simultaneously using Batch Deliveries. Moreover, benefit from an average cost reduction of 15% when dispatching multiple deliveries within the same timeframe.

      Receive Personalized Assistance

      Rely on your dedicated Shypr Account Manager as your direct liaison, ensuring you extract maximum value from your account on a daily basis.

      Safeguard Profit Margins

      Benefit from transparent and foreseeable upfront pricing. Eliminate unexpected expenses tied to zip codes or fuel rates. Bid farewell to additional costs for evenings, weekends, or holidays.

      Experience Tranquility

      Experience direct delivery facilitated through screened and validated drivers. Keep track of your delivery in real-time and opt-in for added cargo coverage for each delivery, with the potential to access up to $10,000 in liability.

      Contact Us

      Whether working at the office or at home, Shypr in-house logistics platform can deliver.

      Like any well-oiled machine, Shypr makes it easy to assign drivers to orders from a speedy and intuitive cloud-based interface.

       

      Shypr simplifies delivery management with advanced features that improve your SLAs, deliver delightful customer experiences and drive profitability for your business.

       

      Shypr takes your delivery operations to the next level with easy-to-use time and cost saving technologies.

      Shypr GPS tracking technology makes it easy to keep recipients updated on when a delivery has started, when it should be expected, and when it’s arriving.

       

      Benefits Of On-Demand Delivery

      Larger Customer Base
      Brands that use online delivery & nationwide providers can reach a wider customer base than offline businesses.
       
      Competitive Pricing
      There is no need to invest in labor, storage, and store operations, our services enable you to offer customers competitive pricing.
       
       
      Advanced Technology
      Advanced on-demand delivery software can understand buying patterns and track orders effortlessly.
       
       
      Lower Costs
      Our delivery services are all-encompassing, helping you deliver any time, anywhere. All our services offer affordable pricing.
       
       

      Typical Industry Use-Case Solutions

      • e-Commerce
      • B2B Distribution
      • Retail
      • 3PL(Third-party Logistics)

      1. Stay on top of your supply process with instant notifications about when orders are packed, shipped, and delivered

      2. Manage on-demand delivery – urgent or scheduled. It is easy and convenient with Shypr

      3. Seamlessly integrate your e-commerce store to automate order fulfillment with warehousing, pick, pack, and ship services

      4. Grow your e-commerce business with a customizable solution that fully integrates with everything you do

      1. Deliver multiple orders in one go

      2. Eliminate the need for error-prone and time-consuming manual order entry with Shypr automated Repetitive Order Scheduler

      3. Allocate driver jobs faster and more accurately in line with customer preferences and remove limitations to improve business costs

      1. Fast and convenient inventory management and tracking experience with our package scanning option

      2. Reduce shipping costs by outsourcing your logistics and supply chain functions to a team of experts with proven technology, processes, and experience

      3. Keep track of your orders from anywhere and receive photo-proof on delivery approval

      4. Stay up to speed with every driver on the go via the app, chat, or phone

      1. Easily move items from one to multiple locations with Shypr one-to-many delivery

      2. Easily ship items from multiple locations to one with Shypr many-to-one delivery

      3. Plan and optimize your routes for speedy and efficient drop-offs with our route optimization algorithm

      1. Round Trip
      2. Nearest Neighbor
      3. Customized Trip (choose a start and finish point for every route)

      FAQs

      Does Shypr offer business courier services?

      Yes.

      How much do you charge for business parcel delivery?

      Well, depends upon the order. If you want to deliver bulk packages then it would cost you less as compared to a single package.

      Do you offer business delivery services in the Bay Area?

      Yes.

      Have you partnered with any company for providing corporate courier services?

      Yes.

      sign up for newsletter

      Sign up today for hints, tips and the latest product news - plus exclusive special offers.

      Subscription Form

      sign up for newsletter

      Sign up today for hints, tips and the latest product news - plus exclusive special offers.

      Subscription Form
